entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Temiskaming Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -14.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Earlton Airport 3:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -14.6°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -21.8°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
